title: Tanaka no Atelier: Nenrei=Kanojo Inai Reki no Mahoutsukai
original_name: 田中のアトリエ ～年齢＝彼女いない歴の魔法使い～
sinopse:
Tanaka is a middle-aged man with a face only a mother could love and a personality that no mother could love. After dying from an accident, a god sends him to another world where he has healing magic.

(Source: MU)
